resources.string: Enter a passcode to override the alarm\nif the code cannot be found.

Created by:
Hannah Butler
Conor Taggart
Kelvin Harron
Peter McCaughey
Location permission is required to determine if user is in home location so that required codes are nearby.
Access to the location service is required to determine if you are in your home location, set in app setting.

This app requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'QR Alarm\'.
If you lose the object you scanned you can always use the override code above.\nIf you want to set a new one, click on the overflow menu (top right) and go to settings.
A name and memo will help you quickly choose what to scan
Scan a barcode or QR code
Something that you tend to use each morning!
Get the object and scan to deactivate the alarm. Now you\'re all set for the day!
Always make sure to set your home location in settings so that, should your alarm go off when you are not at home, you can easily dismiss it.
